CustomField.description: This field field is Created to Perform the Per Kg Rate Calculation only for Banded Z6 Price Structure to display the output rates in the CSV files created for SAP . For Banded Z6 Per KG Rate output rate would always be 0 for less than 5kg and for >5kg it would be the existing per kg rate multiplied by the cubic factor . If Price Structure is not Banded Z6 it would return original Per Kg Rate being fed as part of SAP rate creation.
CustomField.label: Calculated Per Kg Rate
